name: Adopt-A-Phoenix
description:
Well, it seems like you  want to take care of a phoenix don't you? Well its gonna take a lot of courage to take care of these dangerous fellows. They could kill you at any moment.

This game is a virtual pet game like Tamagotchi. But in this one mixes in a battle system if you don't take good care of your pet.

Coding and Ideas by ThatMegalosaurus, Art and ideas by SandiiSnooters. Playtesting by Lane, Mojoe, Kiowa and Neptubee.
